00054 class tx_ligestmembrelabo_add {
00055 
00056 
00057                 // Internal, static: GPvars
00058                 
00060         var $P;
00062         var $doClose;

00066 
00072         function init() {
00073                 $this->P = t3lib_div::_GP('P');
00074                 $this->doClose = t3lib_div::_GP('doClose');             // Used for the return URL to alt_doc.php so that we can close the window.
00075         }
00076 
00083         function main() {
00084                 $BACK_PATH='../../../../typo3/';
00085                 global $TCA;
00086 
00087                 
00088                 
00089                 
00090                 if ($this->doClose)     {
00091                         $this->closeWindow();
00092                 } else {
00093 
00094                                 // Initialize:
00095                         $table = $this->P['table'];
00096                         $field = $this->P['field'];
00097                         t3lib_div::loadTCA($table);
00098                         $config = $TCA[$table]['columns'][$field]['config'];
00099                         $fTable = $this->P['currentValue']<0 ? $config['neg_foreign_table'] : $config['foreign_table'];
00100                         
00101                         $table_enregistrement = $this->P['params']['table']; // Table où sera créé l'enregistrement
00102                         $champ_enregistrement = $this->P['params']['champ']; // Champ que l'on veut préremplir
00103                         
00104                         // On créé l'enregisterment avec notre utilisateur courant
00105                         $tstamp = time();
00106                         
00107                         $insertFields = array(
00108                                 'pid' => $this->P['pid'],
00109                                 'tstamp' => $tstamp,
00110                                 'crdate' => $tstamp,
00111                                 $champ_enregistrement => $this->P['uid']
00112                         );
00113                         
00114                         
00115 
00116                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($table_enregistrement, $insertFields);
00117 
00118                         // On recherche l'enregistrement que l'on vient de créer
00119                         
00120                         $select_fields = '*';
00121                         $from_table = $table_enregistrement;
00122                         $where_clause = '';
00123                         $groupBy = '';
00124                         $orderBy = 'crdate DESC';
00125                         $limit = '';
00126                         $tryMemcached = '';
00127                         
00128                         
00129                         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields, $from_table, $where_clause, $groupBy, $orderBy, $tryMemcached);
00130 
00131                         $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00132                         
00133                         // Enregistrement à éditer
00134                         $uid = 0;
00135                         $uid = intval($row['uid']);
00136 
00137 
00138                         if (is_array($config) && $config['type']=='select' && !$config['MM'] && $config['maxitems']<=1 && $fTable)      {       // SINGLE value:
00139                                 header('Location: '.t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($BACK_PATH.'alt_doc.php?returnUrl='.rawurlencode('wizard_edit.php?doClose=1').'&edit['.$fTable.']['.$uid.']=edit'));
00140 
00141                         
00142                         } elseif (is_array($config) && $this->P['currentSelectedValues'] && (($config['type']=='select' && $config['foreign_table']) || ($config['type']=='group' && $config['internal_type']=='db')))  {       // MULTIPLE VALUES:
00143 
00144                                         // Init settings:
00145                                 $allowedTables = $config['type']=='group' ? $config['allowed'] : $config['foreign_table'].','.$config['neg_foreign_table'];
00146                                 $prependName=1;
00147                                 $params='';
00148 
00149                                         // Selecting selected values into an array:
00150                                 $dbAnalysis = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_loadDBGroup');
00151                                 $dbAnalysis->start($this->P['currentSelectedValues'],$allowedTables);
00152                                 $value = $dbAnalysis->getValueArray($prependName);
00153 
00154                                         // Traverse that array and make parameters for alt_doc.php:
00155                                 foreach($value as $rec) {
00156                                         $recTableUidParts = t3lib_div::revExplode('_',$rec,2);
00157                                         $params.='&edit['.$recTableUidParts[0].']['.$recTableUidParts[1].']=edit';
00158                                 }
00159 
00160                                         // Redirect to alt_doc.php:
00161                                 header('Location: '.t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($BACK_PATH.'alt_doc.php?returnUrl='.rawurlencode('wizard_edit.php?doClose=1').$params));
00162                         
00163                         } else {
00164                                 $this->closeWindow();
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167         }
00168 
00174         function closeWindow()  {
00175                 echo '<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">close();</script>';
00176                 exit;
00177         }
00178 }
